org.gsma.joyn.session

Class MultimediaSessionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gsma.joyn.JoynService
      • org.gsma.joyn.session.MultimediaSessionService

  • public class MultimediaSessionService
extends JoynService
    This class offers the main entry point to initiate and manage new and existing multimedia sessions. Several applications may connect/disconnect to the API.
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET

      • initiateSession

        public MultimediaSession initiateSession(java.lang.String serviceId,
                                java.lang.String contact,
                                java.lang.String sdp,
                                MultimediaSessionListener listener)
                                  throws JoynServiceException,
                                         JoynContactFormatException
        Initiates a new multimedia session with a remote contact and for a given service. The SDP (Session Description Protocol) parameter is used to describe the supported media. The parameter contact supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI. If the format of the contact is not supported an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - Service ID
        contact - Contact
        sdp - Local SDP
        listener - Multimedia session event listener
        Returns:
        Multimedia session
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
        JoynContactFormatException

      • getSessions

        public java.util.Set<MultimediaSession> getSessions(java.lang.String serviceId)
                                             throws JoynServiceException
        Returns the list of sessions associated to a given service ID
        Parameters:
        serviceId - Service ID
        Returns:
        List of sessions
        Throws:

      • getSession

        public MultimediaSession getSession(java.lang.String sessionId)
                             throws JoynServiceException
        Returns a current session from its unique session ID
        Returns:
        Multimedia session or null if not found

      • getSessionFor

        public MultimediaSession getSessionFor(Intent intent)
                                throws JoynServiceException
        Returns a current session from its invitation Intent
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String serviceId,
                  java.lang.String contact,
                  java.lang.String content,
                  java.lang.String contentType)
                    throws JoynServiceException,
                           JoynContactFormatException
        Sends an instant message to a contact and for a given service. The message may be any type of content. The parameter contact supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI. If the format of the contact is not supported an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - Service ID
        contact - Contact
        content - Message content
        contentType - Content type of the message
        Returns:
        Returns true if sent successfully else returns false
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
        JoynContactFormatException
